attributes.action: legislate for the prohibition and removal of redundant vehicles and the like being deployed besides roadways as unauthorised advertising hoardings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Travel any motorway or major road and you will see large lorries and articulated vehicle trailers left in fields in prominant locations bearing advertising banners.

This happens everywhere, including National Parks and areas of outstanding beauty.

Besides the ugliness of the practice, the conduct has road safety implications as they often bear web addresses or phone numbers which may encourage drivers into trying to take notes whilst driving at speed.
